title: Which is the best format for writing a documentary script? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ve done maybe a dozen documentaries, and none of them had a working script prior to beginning shooting. Documentaries are an editor’s art form. The kernel of the story is generally found after examining all of the footage. Making a documentary is generally a process of discovery, and the script is usually descriptive rather than prescriptive.
Final Draft has a selection of formats. I prefer my own for documentaries though. I divide the page down the middle and have VO opposite the vision.
